name: Sheath Fire
description:
In Sheath Fire, you wield your sword to fight enemies of 2 different themes.

When your sword is unsheathed, you can slash at enemies with left click, and when your sheath is ready, sheath with right click. When you kill enemies, they leave energy behind that explodes when you sheath.

When your sword is sheathed, you can dash with left click, and when your sword is ready, unsheathe with right click. Your unsheathe counts as an attack and does a lot of damage, so use it wisely.

WASD to move.

Made with pygame.
